acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU ARE DESTINED TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD, BUT STRUGGLE COMPLETING ALL YOU SET OUT TO DO
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU ARE DESTINED TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN THE WORLD, BUT STRUGGLE COMPLETING ALL YOU SET OUT TO DO

I'm picking up a strong energetic frequency from you, {FIRSTNAME}.

Wow! You are a high vibrational human being!

You've probably lived your whole life like this haven’t you? With an active imagination, always looking to experience new things.

Seeing new places, exploring, making new friends, having lively conversations... I can just picture you in Rio or Mardi Gras right now, a happy social butterfly.

Your free spirit is never bored, is it?

Fluttering from one thing to another, seeing the wonder in the world, gathering and sharing ideas, keep your audience on the edge of their seats...

And your talents don’t stop there... your curiosity and know-how make you able to adapt to whatever comes your way in life.

But your hunger for the new may have you jumping to the next great idea... before you’ve managed to finish what you’ve already begun…

This leaves projects up in the air, and the destiny that you were born to live… forever out of reach.

{FIRSTNAME}, I can sense that your generous soul is yearning to make a difference in the world… something that connects to your heart and reaches out to the hearts of others…

You know that it is finally time for you to fulfill your life mission, your Soul Path...

And you’ve been looking for a sign to show you exactly what this may be, and how to make it happen...

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward that life mission now.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT THE MOST OUT OF LIFE, YOU MUST PAUSE TO GAIN FOCUS

{FIRSTNAME}, your energy reading shows you’re powerfully infused with purpose and a zest for life. And this feeds your mind with a kaleidoscope of colorful ideas.
Your energy is so powerful, it flows into multiple things, organizing and starting new projects… which can leave things up in the air behind you.

It is incredibly hard to raise your frequency when your focus is scattered.

And you’ll always have a feeling of dissatisfaction and feel incomplete… if your bubbling energy isn’t channeled into following through and completing your ideas.

I can feel your energy needs to be guided… channeled to focus… because, what you seek the most will only be found when you actually finish the wonderful things you start.

This will bring your energy into balance and allow you to finally connect the last dots with ease.

Just like a whirlwind has a calm inner center, when you pause in the eye of your storm of action, you connect to something miraculous.

This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

And the way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

You are here to bring your radiant light into the world… to share something of importance that will uplift yourself and others.

By pausing to direct your incredible energy within, you’ll connect to all the answers you’ve been looking for.

Then dance fully in the light, making change with channelled focus, creating and completing what your soul was brought here to do.

This is the next chapter of your life…
